projects.title: Financial Dashboard
projects.description: Complete redesign of financial management dashboard
projects.problem: The existing financial dashboard was outdated, difficult to navigate, and lacked real-time data visualization capabilities. Users struggled to find key financial metrics and make informed decisions quickly.
projects.solution: We redesigned the entire dashboard with modern UI patterns, improved information hierarchy, and interactive data visualizations. The new design reduced user friction and increased engagement by 45%.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: End-to-end product design for online store
projects.problem: High cart abandonment rate (68%) and confusing checkout process. Users complained about difficulty finding products and completing purchases.
projects.solution: Streamlined the entire shopping flow, improved search functionality, and simplified checkout. Result: 25% reduction in abandonment rate and 35% increase in conversions.
